snippet.title: An Ankou - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist An Ankou on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2281650/An_Ankou/

Death is not the end. You’ve been chosen as the Ankou, a servant of Death who aids lost souls using the tools of your old trade. Roam haunted lands to find resources, craft weapons, and slay hordes of demons in this action-exploration roguelike.

Developed by Alkemi
Published by PID Games
Music by Louis Godart
SFX by Alexis Laugier
